name: Millennium Park
desc: Downtown park with splash pad, playground, music events, and Cloud Gate (the Bean).

name: DuPage Children's Museum
desc: Hands-on STEAM activities for young kids, sensory rooms, and rotating exhibits.

name: The Forge: Lemont Quarries
desc: Adventure park with ropes course, zip lines, paddleboats, and more.

name: Brookfield Zoo
desc: Huge zoo with animal exhibits, kids’ play areas, splash pads, and special events.

name: Peggy Notebaert Nature Museum
desc: Butterfly haven, hands-on nature play spaces, and wildlife exhibits.

name: Lincoln Park Zoo
desc: Historic free zoo with animals, train ride, carousel, and kids’ farm area.

name: Cosley Zoo
desc: Mini-zoo with farm animals and small mammals. Perfect for younger kids.

name: LEGOLAND Discovery Center
desc: LEGO-themed rides, 4D cinema, play zones, and building activities.

name: Morton Arboretum Children's Garden
desc: Sprawling gardens with treehouses, streams, splash areas, and nature play.

name: Shedd Aquarium
desc: One of the world's best aquariums with sharks, dolphins, and hands-on exhibits.

name: Knoch Knolls Nature Center
desc: Interactive nature center and outdoor trails along the river.

name: Bison's Bluff Nature Playground
desc: Nature-inspired play structures, stream, sand pit, and climbing boulders.

name: SciTech Hands On Museum
desc: Science exhibits, demonstrations, and interactive play for curious kids.

name: Naper Settlement
desc: Outdoor history museum with historic buildings, costumed interpreters, and family events.

name: Funtopia Glenview
desc: Indoor adventure park with climbing walls, ropes course, and giant slides.

name: Lake Katherine Nature Center & Botanic Gardens
desc: Trails, waterfall, wildlife, and interactive nature center for kids.

name: Skokie Water Playground
desc: Outdoor pool with splash features, water slides, and tot play zone.

name: Wonder Works Children's Museum
desc: Play museum for children under 8 with creative exhibits and sensory play.

name: Maggie Daley Park Play Garden
desc: Massive downtown playground with themed zones, splash pads, and mini golf.

name: Pirate's Cove Theme Park
desc: Imaginative pirate-themed play park for kids ages 1–9.

name: The Exploritorium
desc: Indoor play center with climbing structures, water play, and pretend town.

name: Ball Factory Playground
desc: Giant ball pits, obstacle courses, inflatables, and toddler zone.

name: Vertical Endeavors
desc: Indoor rock climbing gym with bouldering, top rope, and auto-belays.

name: Enchanted Castle
desc: Arcade, mini golf, go karts, laser tag, and kids' play zone.

name: Pump It Up
desc: Bounce house and inflatable play park with open jump and parties.

name: North Avenue Beach
desc: Popular city beach with sand play, volleyball, and lake views.

name: Prairie Path Books Storytime
desc: Weekly story time at a local bookstore, often with crafts or songs.

name: Safari Land
desc: Indoor amusement park with rides, bowling, bumper cars, and arcade.

name: Evanston Ecology Center
desc: Nature center with live animals, educational exhibits, and seasonal outdoor programs.

name: Elmhurst Art Museum Family Days
desc: Art workshops and hands-on activities for families and children.

name: Sky Zone Trampoline Park
desc: Trampoline park with foam pits, dodgeball, and a toddler jump zone.

name: Cantigny Park
desc: Beautiful gardens, playground, museum, and family nature walks.

name: Harold Washington Library Center
desc: Downtown library with a large children's center, storytimes, and free events.

name: Glen Ellyn Public Library
desc: Fantastic kids' area, crafts, and family reading events all year.

name: Fullersburg Woods Nature Education Center
desc: Forest preserve with walking trails, kids’ programs, and wildlife viewing.

name: Chicago Botanic Garden
desc: Beautiful gardens, Model Railroad Garden, family events, and kids’ discovery programs.

name: Lost Mountain Adventure Golf
desc: Waterfalls, caves, and fun mini golf for all ages.

name: Wilderness Falls Mini Golf
desc: Two mini golf courses, batting cages, and a mining adventure.

name: The Water Works Indoor Water Park
desc: Indoor waterpark with slides, splash playground, and lap pool.

name: Blackberry Farm
desc: Historic pioneer village, carousel, train rides, farm animals, and playground.

name: Lambs Farm
desc: Petting zoo, train ride, mini golf, old-fashioned country fun, and a café.

name: Main Event Entertainment
desc: Bowling, arcade, laser tag, gravity ropes, and family fun center.

name: Ultimate Ninjas
desc: Ninja warrior obstacle gym with open play, classes, and birthday parties.

name: Brooklyn Boulders
desc: Indoor climbing gym with bouldering, classes, and kids’ camps.

name: Aurora Regional Fire Museum
desc: Explore historic fire engines, interactive exhibits, and firefighting history.

name: Kline Creek Farm
desc: Living history 1890s farm with animals, farmhouse tours, and seasonal activities.

name: Pelican Harbor Indoor/Outdoor Aquatic Park
desc: Indoor and outdoor pools, slides, lazy river, and tot area.

name: Goebbert’s Farm & Garden Center
desc: Petting zoo, play yard, fall pumpkin festival, and seasonal events.

name: Santa’s Village Amusement & Water Park
desc: Classic amusement rides, water slides, animal encounters, and Santa meet & greets.

name: Elmhurst History Museum
desc: Local history museum with hands-on family exhibits and free kids’ days.

name: Splash Landings Indoor Aquatic Center
desc: Indoor pool with play features, water slides, and tot area.

name: Lombard Roller Rink
desc: Classic family roller skating, beginner lessons, and birthday parties.

name: Chicago Children’s Museum
desc: Hands-on exhibits, play zones, creative workshops at Navy Pier.

name: Taste of Chicago (Seasonal)
desc: City’s biggest food festival, kids’ activities, live music, and food tastings.

name: Wheaton Park District Indoor Pool
desc: Lap swim, open swim, family water play, and swim lessons.

name: Elmhurst Art Museum Family Days
desc: Art workshops and hands-on activities for families and children.

name: Lyman Woods Nature Center
desc: Nature preserve, interpretive center, trails, and butterfly garden.

name: Naperville Public Library
desc: Huge children’s section, regular storytime, crafts, and STEAM programs.
